item.title: Work-From-Home Essentials Cheat Sheet
item.description:
Use this cheat sheet as a checklist for the essential needs of teams making a change to working-from-home (WFH). These are recommended minimum requirements for WFH.

This article accompanies the Skills Matter talk of 13 August 2020, “Essential Techniques for Leading Software Teams in the Work From Home Era”.
